name: Inner Shadows
description:
Inner Shadows is a Horror Game where you traverse through your twisted mind armed with only a flashlight and your wits, while having to face your fears, and remembering your dark past along the way. Until you finally remember your haunting past, and face your fears, you will be trapped in this Nightmarish world, FOREvER


 Download the Prototype Here  Notice: It will be very buggy Core Mechanics

The Core mechanic of the game is Based on the Protagonist's Fears, there are no enemies from the start, but the more scared the Protagonist is, the more enemies will appear, but there are multiple types of enemies, there's a way to conquer every fear.

Controls

WASD- Move

Left MB- Flashlight On/Off

E- Interact

F- Pick-up

Right MB- Drop
